attributes.action: Confirm he will re-appoint Mervyn King as Governor of the Bank of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a vote of confidence in the Governor of the Bank of England we petition the Prime Minister to immediately confirm that Mr King will be re-appointed in his position.

The integrity and insight that Mr King has shown in the current economic crisis is in short supply else where. The financial stability of the UK would be enhanced by the knowledge that the Governor of the Bank of England has the full support of the Prime Minister and his Chancellor.
